snippet: The state's top environmental official says his staff faces months of work on revised rules governing the controversial gas drilling process.
abstract: The state's top environmental official says his staff faces months of work on revised rules governing the controversial gas drilling process.
lead_paragraph: New York regulators have received more than 60,000 public comments on the state's plan to allow hydrofracking, Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo's top environmental official said on Tuesday at a hearing.

headline.main: Fracking Is Not a 'Fait Accompli' for 2012, N.Y. Official Says
